p.k: Stuart and the family rush to the hospital to be by the bedside of Stuart's dad Willie. Needle-phobic Stu is asked to have a blood test, and a drunk Ted tries to make things better with his wife Kate. (2020). Cast: Lee Mack, Samantha Spiro, Sarah Hoare, Geoff McGivern, Patrick Baladi, Neil Fitzmaurice. Director: Ben Palmer.
